name: arborescent
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
looking like a tree or growing in a way similar to a tree: Tree ferns produce arborescent or tree-like forms. Many fossil species were arborescent. Related words
arboreal
arboretum
More examplesFewer examplesThe genus Glossopteris consisted of arborescent and herbaceous plants.These crystal aggregates form delicate, radiating arborescent patterns.Tall arborescent palms of all sizes were found abundantly at the study site.Several species are climbers, some have trunk-like rhizomes, and a few are genuinely arborescent, with tall, rigid trunks bearing a crown of fronds.The Bois de Boulogne has little in common with the Forest of Dean, apart from certain arborescent features.
